title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1202.4 - Roadway markings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1202.4 - Roadway markings

State Regulations

Unless otherwise directed, vehicles shall at all times
stay to the right of the center of all roadways except in the case of one-way
roadways. Where a roadway is marked with traffic lanes, vehicles shall remain
within the designated lanes and shall not change lanes except those marked by
broken lines. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1202.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
